channel.title: broken turrets
channel.description: problem is there: broken turrets. when i pick one, I pick the edge of its leg, but i must pick it on its middle part. Please, fix this bugs in next update, i'll be so happy. And AI, it's... not ideal.

item.title: broken turrets

item.description:
problem is there: broken turrets. when i pick one, I pick the edge of its leg, but i must pick it on its middle part.
Please, fix this bugs in next update, i’ll be so happy. And AI, it’s… not ideal.
